text: Mu sa shuo: Women de zhu a! Ni ba ge zhong zhuangshi pin he jinshi shenghuo de ge zhong caichan jiyu falao he ta de guizumen--women de zhu a!--Yizhi tamen shi minzhong beili ni de dadao. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni hui diao tamen de caichan, qiu ni fengbi tamen de xin. Dan yuan tamen bu xindao, zhidao kanjian tongku de xingfa.
